description: As a Mage student, Telara developed a method of extending the power of Zora magic via resonating crystals and lenses.
requirementsTooltip: You must select Telara, Headmaster Historian, as your hero.
tooltip: As a Mage student, Telara developed a method of extending the power of Zora magic via resonating crystals and lenses. (+15% Ranged Attack Range - Spark Mage, Stormbolter, Mage Cannon, Ministry, Crystal Tower, and Bastille)
